	direction LR

	}
	MOVIES {

		TIMESTAMP created_at  ""  
	}
	MOVIE_GENRES {

	}

		INT movie_id  ""

		VARCHAR sentiment  ""

	}
	WATCHED {

	}

	USERS||--o{USER_FAVORITE_GENRES:"has"
	GENRES||--o{USER_FAVORITE_GENRES:"tagged"
	MOVIES||--o{MOVIE_GENRES:"categorized"

	MOVIES||--o{REVIEWS:"receives"
